src:
Göteborgs kafékung har ögonen på Stockholm: ”Vi har pratat med Jernhusen”
GÖTEBORG. Med 13 enheter i cafékedjan Le Pain Français går ägaren Samuel Samuelsson nu vidare med ett nytt koncept. På Centralstationen slår han upp portarna till Metropolitan, och i tankar finns en idé om att denna gång ta sig utanför hemstaden. 
05 Nov 2019, 21:26 by Cathrine Hofbauer





Foto: Magnus Gotander

text:
Gothenburg's café king has his eyes on Stockholm: "We have talked to Jernhusen"
GOTHENBURG. With 13 units in the cafe chain Le Pain Français, owner Samuel Samuelsson is now moving on with a new concept. At the Central Station, he opens the gates to the Metropolitan, and in his mind there is an idea that this time he will move outside the hometown.
05 Nov 2019, 21:26 by Cathrine Hofbauer





Photo: Magnus Gotander
